questions.question: He is ................................. on mischief.
questions.description: The past participle of bend is bent.

questions.question: I have ..................................... them for a long time.
questions.description: We use the past participle form of the verb after has, have or had.

questions.question: Political conflict has ........................................ the nation.
questions.description: The past participle of tear is torn.

questions.question: The kitten .................................... a hole in the curtain.
questions.description: The past simple form of tear is tore.

questions.question: The man was ............................................. by a speeding vehicle.
questions.description: The past participle of hit is hit.

questions.question: The house was .............................................. among the trees.
questions.description: The past participle of hide is hidden.

questions.question: The farmer was .......................................... by the dog.
questions.description: The past participle of bite is bitten.

questions.question: Last winter the water pipes ....................................... in the cold weather.
questions.description: Burst has only one form - burst

questions.question: The hikers ............................................ their way up the hill.
questions.description: The past of wind is wound.

questions.question: The sweater has ............................................ thin at the elbows.
questions.description: The past participle of wear is worn.

questions.question: Much water has ....................................................... under the bridge.
questions.description: Flown is the past participle of flow.
